snippet: Lazard worked on a number of prominent transactions that were completed in the fourth quarter, including Walgreen’s acquisition of a remaining 55 percent stake in Alliance Boots and 21st Century Fox’s sale of European holdings to BSkyB.
abstract: Lazard worked on a number of prominent transactions that were completed in the fourth quarter, including Walgreen’s acquisition of a remaining 55 percent stake in Alliance Boots and 21st Century Fox’s sale of European holdings to BSkyB.

headline.main: Lazard Reports Higher Profit on Surge in M.&A.
